title: How to stop feeling sad after finishing a good novel - Quora

response.answer_text: Book Hangover: "Inability to start a new book because you're still living in the last book's world." A good novel makes you feel apart of the story, you may not consciously realize just how much you relate to the characters, you feel a loss as though a relationship is over. “You can’t, if you can’t feel it, if it never Rises from the soul, and sways The heart of every single hearer, With deepest power, in simple ways. You’ll sit forever, gluing things together, Cooking up a stew from other’s scraps, Blowing on a miserable fire, Made from your heap of dying ash. Let apes and children praise your art, If their admiration’s to your taste, But you’ll never speak from heart to heart, Unless it rises up from your heart’s space.” ― Johann Wolfgang von Goethe, Faust: First Part "Don't cry because it's over, smile because it happened." -- Dr. Seuss

The definition of a good novel is the book which can touch certain strings in our heart ! If a novel can make you emotional it is not bad thing which needs to be changed. But if you still want to , then try these suggestions - After reading the last page , watch some light , comical TV show .2. Don’t be alone , visit some friends and enjoy . 3. Don’t dwell to much on the lead characters situation and don’t try and compare your life to theirs . 4. People have this habit on picking up the bad habits in a book , but you should try and pick up the good points . Also imbibe them in your lifestyle.
